summary: A simple customizer that enables the user to customize the way Sephina looks. Comes with all the options you can expect from a CC Customizer
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][center]
[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img921/1439/HA1yP9.png[/img]

[color=#93c47d][size=3][b][i][url=https://www.facebook.com/ClearanceClarenceMods][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/640x480q90/924/cG7PGI.png[/img][/url]
[/i][/b][/size][/color]

[size=3][color=#e69138][b][i]Screenshots are Wanted! If some of you could upload some screenshots it would be much appreciated![/i][/b][/color][/size]

[size=3]This mod allows you to change the way Sephina looks. You can change the body textures, teeth, face and eyes.[/size]

[img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/320x240q90/922/tUyKv0.png[/img]

[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69515/?]Sephina The Huntress[/url][/size]
[size=4]If you plan to use Â TBBP meshes, you also require the following:[/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54044/?]HDT Breast And Butt Physics[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton - XPMS [/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended - XPMSE[/url][/size]

[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img924/2578/9D7W5O.png[/img]

[color=#0b8db3][size=6]Manual Installation[/size][/color]
[size=3]Download the package you want and extract it using WinRar. Now you have 3 folders. Base, FOMod and Options. Delete the FOMod folder since you won't need it. Now go to the base folder and select the bodytype you want and open that folder and copy the .nif files to [i][color=#6aa84f]data\meshes\actor\character\Sephina[/color][/i] and overwrite the .nif files. Now the body is installed. Now go into the options folder and chose what kind of texture you want. Once you find it open it and copy all the files to [i][color=#6aa84f]data\textures\actor\character\Sephina[/color][/i]. The eyes goes into the [i][color=#6aa84f]Sephina\eyes[/color][/i] folder.[/size]

[color=#0b8db3][size=6]You want to use SeveNBase ?[/size][/color]
[size=3]Firstly make sure you have the UNP version installed [b]NOT[/b] the CBBE. This is because SeveNBase and UNP uses the same setup for textures while CBBE does not. So if you are installing SeveNBase while using CBBE textures you'll see some pretty horrible textures glitches like for example, nipple in the forhead, bellybutton in the leg and so on. Once you have downloaded and installed the UNP version just download the SeveNBase body you want Sephina to use and replace her meshes at [i][color=#6aa84f]data\meshes\actor\character\Sephina[/color][/i] with the SeveNbase meshes you just downloaded.[/size]

[color=#0B8DB3][size=6]Credits[/size][/color]
[size=5][color=#0B8DB3]Body Meshes[/color][/size]

[size=3][color=#0A7A9B]CBBE Meshes[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url][/i][/size]

[size=3][color=#0A7A9B]UNP Meshes[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNP Blessed Body[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40156/?]UNPC Body v2dot5[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35748/?]UNPetite[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41051/?]UNP Topmodel[/url][/i][/size]

[size=5][color=#0B8DB3]Body/Face Texture[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Texture Renewal[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature Skin Texture[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36425/?]Real Girls[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4686/?]Human Texture[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25588/?]Women of Skyrim[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin[/url][/i][/size]

[size=5][color=#0B8DB3]Eyes[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49963/?]True Eyes[/url][/i][/size]

author: ClearanceClarence

files.name: Sephina The Huntress Customizer - CBBE - 1.1.0
files.changelogHtml:
Removed Mature V1, Milkdrinker and Barbarian textures
Added Demoniac, SKY Female and Leyenda as a texture options
Changed the internals of the installer
I removed the previews of the bodies with large images of the textures instead. Now just use the installer in full screen for a detailed view of the body textures you want to install
Removed SeveNBase as an option, If you still want to use it see the main page for instructions
